name: lurp-projects
description: Lurp Projects A collection of different projects, hosted both on the lurp.it domain and elsewhere.

scripts.clean: if exist dist (rmdir /s /q dist) else mkdir dist
scripts.build:memory-game: cd memory-game && npm run build && cd .. && xcopy memory-game\dist\* dist\memory-game\ /E /I /H /Y
scripts.build:webbens-historia: cd webbens-historia && npm run build && cd .. && xcopy webbens-historia\dist\* dist\webbens-historia\ /E /I /H /Y
scripts.build:framtidsstaden: cd framtidsstaden && npm run build && cd .. && xcopy framtidsstaden\dist\* dist\framtidsstaden\ /E /I /H /Y
scripts.build:lagar-och-sakerhet: cd lagar-och-sakerhet && npm run build && cd .. && xcopy lagar-och-sakerhet\dist\* dist\lagar-och-sakerhet\ /E /I /H /Y
scripts.build:alexander: cd alexander && npm run build && cd .. && xcopy alexander\dist\* dist\alexander\ /E /I /H /Y
scripts.build: npm-run-all --silent clean build:copy:* build:memory-game build:webbens-historia build:framtidsstaden build:lagar-och-sakerhet build:alexander

author: lurp
